Barechoo et Adonai hamevorach. Barooch Adonai hamevorach l'olam va'ed. Baruch attah Adonai, Eloheinoo melech ha'olam, asher bachar banoo meekol ha'ameem, v'nattan lanoo et torato, baruch attah Adonai, notayn hatorah. Baruch attah Adonai, Eloheinoo melech ha'olam, asher nattan lanoo torat emmett, v'chayei olam nattah b'tochaynoo, baruch attah Adonai, notayn hatorah.
